- Greg Monroe was drafted in 2009.
- Willie Warren was drafted in 2010, which is after Monroe.
- Tyler Zeller was drafted in 2012, also after Monroe.
- Scotty Hopson and Michael Dunigan were undrafted.

Since no other player listed was drafted earlier than Greg Monroe (in both year and draft position), the claim that "Greg Monroe be the earliest player to be drafted" is true.

The relevant cells for this determination are those pertaining to the NBA draft information:

2. For Willie Warren: 2010, second round, 54th pick.
